title: Extend Watchface
summary: Extend is a Watchface for Android Wear containing 3 colors, 2 themes and more!
description: Extend Watchfacefeatures- 3 Color Variations- 2 Themes- Battery & Date- Classic Ambient Display- More to come!Only for Android Wear Devices running 5.0.1 or higher!Configuration Instructions- Install Watchface from Google Play- Open Android Wear app- Open up the selection for all Android Wear Watchfaces- Locate "Extend" and select it, you should see a gear icon- Hit the Gear icon and it should trigger the configuration settingPlease allow 10-15 minutes for the Watchface to appear in the app/on the watchSpecial thanks to Addie Baker for the source code: http://goo.gl/7OvsG4
descriptionHTML:
Extend Watchface
features
- 3 Color Variations
- 2 Themes
- Battery & Date
- Classic Ambient Display
- More to come!
Only for Android Wear Devices running 5.0.1 or higher!


Configuration Instructions
- Install Watchface from Google Play
- Open Android Wear app
- Open up the selection for all Android Wear Watchfaces
- Locate "Extend" and select it, you should see a gear icon
- Hit the Gear icon and it should trigger the configuration setting


Please allow 10-15 minutes for the Watchface to appear in the app/on the watch


Special thanks to Addie Baker for the source code: http://goo.gl/7OvsG4
comments: Love the watch face. However Would be nice to see an emphasis of support for lg g watch R, everything is moto 360. Lol want my picture in the huge main screen to be The G watch R.
Great watch face! Love the watch face, adds some elegance to a modern take on a watch design. Smooth ticker is also a great feature to have. Love the customisation!
recentChanges: Added a new square watchface design and got some things ready for a bigger update later next week!
Also, if you enjoy this watchface, please recommend it to your friends or leave a rating! Thanks :D
